test.name: TC001 - Ajouter une tache simple

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Acheter du pain' into text field 'css:.new-todo'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key RETURN to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Acheter du pain'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Verifier qu'on peut ajouter une tache

test.name: TC007 - Ne pas ajouter de tache vide

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key RETURN to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.doc: Returns the number of elements matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Verifier qu'on ne peut pas ajouter de tache vide

test.name: TC003 - Marquer une tache comme terminee

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Faire les courses' into text field 'css:.new-todo'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key RETURN to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Verifier qu'on peut completer une tache

test.name: TC004 - Supprimer une tache

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'A supprimer' into text field 'css:.new-todo'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key RETURN to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.msg: Simulating Mouse Over on element 'css:.todo-list li:first-child label'.
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Page Should Not Contain
kw.msg: Current page does not contain text 'A supprimer'.
kw.doc: Verifies the current page does not contain ``text``.

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.doc: Returns the number of elements matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Verifier qu'on peut supprimer une tache

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
